DOC.detailed_description: Study description : Melatonin , natural hormone pineal gland exclusively release dark phase , exhibit vasodilatatory effect distal skin region reduces core body temperature . This study investigate whether exogenous melatonin ( 5mg p.o . 2p.m . ) afternoon , endogenous melatonin secrete , increase distal skin blood flow , also choroidal blood flow change oxygen consumption . Two subject group study , woman vasospastic syndrome ( VS ) control . The main hypothesis : melatonin normalize distal vasoconstriction VS. Further question also answer : Does melatonin affect basal metabolic rate , increase choroidal blood flow reduce vasospastic syndrome ( VS ) ? Do woman VS exhibit : - different basal metabolic rate - reduce choroidal blood flow - reduced increase oxygen consumption intake ice-water - different oxygen consumption melatonin intake - different choroidal blood flow melatonin intake - different oxygen consumption melatonin intake intake ice-water ... . ?
